\u03a4he Company
\rThe world leader in mineral-based specialty solutions for industry, with over 16,000 employees and over 200 sites worldwide, Imerys delivers high value-added, functional solutions to diversified set of industrial sectors, from processing industries to consumer goods. The Group draws on its knowledge of applications, technological expertise and its material science know-how to deliver solutions based on beneficiation of its mineral resources, synthetic minerals and formulations. These contribute essential properties to customers\u2019 products and performance, including refractoriness, hardness, conductivity, opacity, durability, purity, lightness, filtration, absorption and repellency. Imerys is determined to develop responsibly, in particular by fostering the emergence of environmentally-friendly products and processes.If you want to grow your skills and develop your career, find out more at [Link available when viewing the job]
\rThe PositionI
\rT Procurement Coordinator
\r
\rJob Summary
\r

\rIT Procurement Coordinator

\r

Location: Athens, Greece / Other in Europe

\r

Role overview: \u00a0Ensures efficient procurement processes and supervises all procurement activities for the different entities.

\r

Reports To: IT Manager Procurement

\r

Direct reports: No

\r


\rResponsibilities and Duties

\r

IT Procurement:

\r
    \r
  • Is responsible for the procurement done for the different ERPs and in contact with the different Finance and Purchase local organizations
    • \r
  • Ensures that service reception is performed in due time
    • \r
  • Follows-up the Invoice validation and escalation process as well as the Litigation, if any
    • \r
  • Works with Accounting/controlling on closing activity (provision)
    • \r
  • Ensures payment follow-up and no risk of service interruption due to bad Supplier invoice management
    • \r
\r


\rIn coordination with Purchasing and IT Controlling:

\r
    \r
  • Supports Purchasing on sourcing activity
    • \r
  • Works together with Purchasing and IT strategy on centralizing information around the suppliers (services, contracts, supplier assessment, litigation)
    • \r
  • Supports Budget and its follow-up process with Managers
    • \r
  • Coordinates and follows-up certain Software License
    • \r
\r


\rContinuous improvement:

\r
    \r
  • Applies a consistent procurement procedure, including deployment of the following sub processes: specification requirements, supplier identification, proposal analysis, evaluation of suppliers and their processes, contract negotiation, supplier selection and contract placement.
    • \r
  • Ensures that the entire purchasing process is fit for purpose, adds business value to the organization and is compliant to internal rules, legal and regulatory requirements.
    • \r
  • Provides insight to the IT leadership team
    • \r
\r


\rInternal & External Interaction

\r

Inside Imerys:

\r
    \r
  • IT Leadership Team
    • \r
  • IT Office
    • \r
  • IT BPs
    • \r
  • IT Teams
    • \r
  • Group purchasing and Finance departments
    • \r
\r


\rOutside of Imerys:

\r
    \r
  • IT Suppliers
    • \r
\r


\rQualifications & Experience

\r
    \r
  • Bachelor\u2019s or Master\u2019s Degree in Economics, Finance or comparable field
    • \r
  • 3-5 years of practical experience in Procurement, Purchasing or Department Assistance, preferably within an IT department.
    • \r
  • ERP knowledge and experience is a plus (SAP in particular)
    • \r
\r


\r

\rSkills & Person Specification
\r


\r
    \r
  • Fluent or native English speaker
    • \r
  • Experience of working within a culturally diverse global company
    • \r
  • Conversant in French or another European language would be advantageous
    • \r
